summary: After forsaking his family and religion, a husband finds his wife is demoniacally possessed.
cast: Rajniesh Duggall|Adah Sharma|Anjori Alagh|Raj Zutshi|Vipin Sharma|Amin Hajee|Ashok Beniwal|Bob Brahmbhatt|Ashish Pradhan|Rakhi Sawant|Indraneil Sengupta|Asha Sharma|Bakul Thakkar|Shri Vallabh Vyas
